name: Escape the System
description:
A micro game I made for a personal Game Jam in two days. The idea was to see if I could make a game in a short amount of time. The name of the Game Jam was called "Escape the Game".

 There may be some bugs. The art and music was created by me. 

You are a pixel that has become sentient. You must make it out of the system. Don't get caught by the drones.
